channel.title: Big Query cannot be executed
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
All table lookups and queries related to Big Query cannot be executed. It was confirmed that there is no problem in data source related connection and key.json. Query execution works normally on the google site as well.
Error running query: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 7292 column 28 (char 322401)
A summary of the issue and the browser/OS environment in which it occurs.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 8 * Browser/OS: * How did you install Redash: AWS EC2 AMI / t2.large

item.title: Big Query cannot be executed
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Can you share what are your configuration settings for the BQ data source?

What debugging steps have you tried? Have you tried re-creating the data source from scratch?

Read full topic

item.description:
Yes, running all the queries gave me an error.

item.title: Big Query cannot be executed
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Do simply no-op queries also fail? Such as SELECT 1?

Read full topic
